scenes.visual_description: Close-up on a crumpled test paper with a big red 'F' marked on it, in dynamic, brightly colored digital comic book art style, with exaggerated wrinkles and shadows.
Fast-paced montage of studying: textbooks flipping, highlighter streaks, coffee steam swirling, all in a vibrant, kinetic digital comic book style with motion blur.
Close-up on a pristine test paper with a big 'A+' marked in bright green, sparkling and radiating success, vibrant digital comic book art.
